description:
- We have keystone+s3tokens validation working.
- We have support for resellers in keystone.swift_auth
- We have swift3 handling properly NoSuchBucket/NosuchKey

We should finish the part where nova/s3.py should be able to talk to swift. A preliminary approach would be to specify the tenant_id directly as a prefix of the URL.
title: Nova s3 should be able to talk to swift
